tool_description: A face recognition API, currently on Beta.
name: Face Recognition
title: Face Recognition

api_list.name: /facebox/check
api_list.description: Endpoint to recognize faces (after the face has been trained)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zyanyatech1-face-recognition-v1.p.rapidapi.com/facebox/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zyanyatech1-face-recognition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /facebox/teach
api_list.description: Endpoint to train faces to be search.
